glsa.title: Dovecot: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Dovecot, the worst of which allowing for remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Dovecot is an IMAP and POP3 server written with security primarily in mind.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Dovecot. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit these vulnerabilities to cause the remote execution of arbitrary code, or a Denial of Service condition, to conduct directory traversal attacks, corrupt data, or disclose information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
